title: What are the important documents and observations related to magnetic healing, and can it affect one's health?
first_phrase: This text presents observations and offers proof of the authenticity of signed reports and letters related to the use of animal magnetism for healing. The author asserts that the practice does not harm health and offers undeniable evidence to convince skeptics. The final section features a quote from Trousseau's "Traité de Thérapeutique" that suggests animal magnetism is a powerful force that should not be dismissed by skeptics. The author challenges contemporary scientists, including Albert Desjardin, to reconsider the value of this scientific question.

last_phrase: In conclusion, instead of sticking to outdated beliefs and denying the possible benefits of new discoveries, it is time for scientists to embrace the potential of zoomagnetism and other emerging scientific fields. Let us not be afraid to explore and evolve our knowledge, always relying on facts and evidence rather than baseless judgment and prejudice.
